name: Merge Number
tags: Android, Block, Boy, Exclusive, Fun, HTML5, Kids, Merge, Number, Online, Puzzle
control: Mouse click or tap to play
shortDesc: Merge Number tests your logical thinking ability. You need to arrange the position of the number blocks appropriately to merge more blocks.
desc: Merge Number is a challenging and exciting puzzle game. In this game, you will face a series of number squares and combine them through simple addition and subtraction operations. When the number of adjacent blocks with the same number exceeds 3, they will be merged into a new block, and the number in it will automatically increase by one. At the same time, you will also get an extra calculation opportunity, giving you more opportunities to continue the game. Note that the game will end immediately when your computer runs out.

name: Golf Field 2
tags: Android, Ball, Boy, Exclusive, Fun, HTML5, Kids, Online, Physics, Shooting, Sport
control: Mouse move to move and mouse click to shoot
shortDesc: The gameplay of Golf Field 2 is simple yet challenging. You need to calculate the optimal launch angle and force so that the ball ends up in the hole.
desc: Golf Field 2 is an addictive mini golf game. In this game, you will challenge different levels. By choosing a specific direction to launch the ball, you will use physical reflection to ensure that the ball bounces correctly and finally enters the hole. However, as you progress through the game, you'll face more challenging levels. Laser fire may appear on some levels. You need to be careful to avoid the laser sweep, because once the laser sweep hits the ball, the game will end immediately.

Your goal is simple: get to the finish line as quickly as possible! But it won't be easy as the road is filled with various challenges and obstacles. You need to maneuver your ship flexibly and avoid collisions with obstacles. In Boat Merge Race, you have a special ability - merge ships. Merge them into better and faster ships.
